sentences.en: He was busily engaged repairing his bike.
sentences.cn: 他正忙着修他的自行车。

sentences.en: The doctor worked busily beneath the blinding lights of the delivery room.
sentences.cn: 医生在产房耀眼的灯光下忙碌地工作。

sentences.en: The twelve jurors were all writing very busily on slates.
sentences.cn: 十二位陪审员都忙着在石板上写些什么。
